|  --- | --- |
|  [$translate(key, params, ctx, lang)](./qwik-speak._translate.md) | Translate a key. The syntax of the string is 'key<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->\[default value\]' |
|  [$translate(keys, params, ctx, lang)](./qwik-speak._translate_1.md) | Translate an array of keys. The syntax of the strings is 'key<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->\[default value\]' |
